description: ABO blood type verification information for the timeout.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the timeout record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DONOR_ABO_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the donor blood group.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


A+


A-


AB+


AB-


B+


B-


O+


O-


A


B


AB


O


A1


A1B


A2


A2B


A1+


A1-


A2+


A2-


A1B+


A1B-


A2B+


A2B-

columns.name: DONOR_ABO_M_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the donor blood group in the timeout record matches the donor blood group value recorded in the organ record


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: DNR_UNOSID
columns.description: Stores the Donor ID from the United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) for the timeout record

columns.name: DNR_UNOS_ID_M_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the donor's United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) ID in the timeout record matches the donor UNOS ID value recorded in the organ record


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DONOR_ABO_M_YN

columns.name: ORGAN_ID
columns.description: Stores the organ ID referenced for the donor blood group and donor's United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) ID

columns.name: ABO_PROC_ID
columns.description: Stores the procedure that the blood group information relates to.

columns.name: ABO_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: ABO_COMPATIBLE_YN
columns.description:
Stores if the blood groups were recorded as compatible.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DONOR_ABO_M_YN

columns.name: ABO_INCOMPATIBL_CMT
columns.description: The reason the procedure was performed in spite of blood group incompatibility.

columns.name: ORGAN_VERIFIED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the type of organ this blood group verification entry is for. Primarily used when dealing with transplants that have no organ records attached.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Blood and Marrow


Lung


Pancreas


Liver


Kidney


Kidney/Pancreas


Intestine


Heart


Heart/Lung


Islet


Face


Upper Limb


Abdominal Wall


Leg


Penis


Trachea


Uterus


Larynx

columns.name: RECIPIENT_NAME_MRN
columns.description: The name and medical record number of the intended recipient for a living donor transplant procedure.

columns.name: RECIPIENT_ABO_C_NAME
columns.description:
The blood group of the intended recipient for a living donor transplant procedure.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DONOR_ABO_C_NAME

columns.name: RECIP_VERIFIED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the recipient identity pulled in from the organ link was verified.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DONOR_ABO_M_YN

columns.name: REC_ABO_VERIFIED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the recipient blood group pulled in from the organ link was verified.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DONOR_ABO_M_YN

columns.name: VEL_ID
columns.description: Stores the anatomy record ID entered during organ check-in

columns.name: VEL_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: Stores record name (.2)

columns.name: ABO_INCOMPAT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the reason they are proceeding with an ABO incompatibly transplant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Per Organ Regulatory Guidelines


Deemed Clinically Appropriate
